name: protein
description: Protein used in experiment. Options include wild-type, delta jaw mutant, none (e.g., DNA-only), and sigma mutant.

name: complex
description: DNA-protein complex formed during the experiment. Options include RPo, RPitc1, RPitc2, and DNA-only.

name: dna
description: DNA used during experiment. Options include wild-type and pre-melted.

name: temperature
description: Temperature at which experiment was performed. Options include room temperature and 37C.

name: immobilization
description: Immobilization method used during experiment. Options include vescicle encapsulation, antibody attachment, and biotin.

name: additives
description: Additives included in the experiment. Options include none, heparin, glycerol.

name: temporal resolution
description: Experimental temporal resolution. Options include 20ms and 100ms

name: repeat number
description: If the experimental conditions have been used before, what repeat is the current experiment? Options include 0, 1, and 2
